meanings.definition: Situated in front of the rectum.
meanings.sent1: The prerectal area is located before the rectum.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the prerectal region during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The cat's favorite spot to nap was the prerectal space on the couch.
meanings.sent4: The sun setting in the prerectal sky cast a warm glow over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The prerectal position of the mailbox made it easy for everyone to access.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the area in front of the rectum.
meanings.sent1: She felt a slight discomfort in the prerectal region.
meanings.sent2: The prerectal surgery was successful in treating the condition.
